choice.title: wincent-strings-util tool
choice.description: The wincent-strings-util executable itself. It will be installed in /usr/local/bin/.

choice.title: wincent-strings-util man page
choice.tooltip: The manual page for the wincent-strings-util executable
choice.description: Manual page for the wincent-strings-util executable. It will be installed in /usr/local/share/man/man1/.

requirement.message-title: This version of Wincent Strings Utility requires Mac OS X 10.6 or later
requirement.message: Versions of the software for older releases of Mac OS X can be found at http://strings.wincent.com/.
Requires Mac OS X 10.6 or later.
